headline: Cardinal Health, Inc. (CAH) Shares Gain Favor as Citi Turns Bullish on Specialist Assets
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Investments During A Recession. Cardinal Health, Inc. is one of the best investments on our list. TheFly reported on January 9 that Citi upgraded CAH from Neutral to Buy, raising the price target from $190 to $244. Daniel Grosslight, a Citi analyst, offered this upgrade, which [â€¦]
